name: Ring In The Night
description:
Tonight's the night.

It's a night like any other.

It will happen tonight.

There's only little time.

A ring in the night.

Lone man in a temp apartment.

It needs to happen tonight.

You are The Liaison. Through a secure phone line, you will receive sets of codes that you must write down and bring outside The City for the Resistance. The City is a dystopian place where dissent can not survive the pressure of the dark powers of The Regime for long.

Yet you must try.

This is a game akin to a short semi-horror/mystery version of Gods Will Be Watching, in an old-school survival horror style instead of the LucasArts-style Classic Point-n-click Adventure Game Style.

Currently, there is one level. More may be coming, possibly more games in the same universe but not necessarily in this style.

Controls:

Keys and Mouse - interact with dialogs

Arrows - Move

Mouse - Navigate dialogs

Z - Interact/Attack (in attack stance)

X - Brace/attack stance

C - Lamp

Shift - Run

Made using Godot, with great CC0 assets from the Open Game Art community, including Quaternius and Kenney and others. Plan on releasing my own little stuff there too (some models, voices and musics)
